tasks.label: migrate
tasks.command: if ('${input:confirmMigrate}' -eq 'Confirmar') { dotnet ef database update --project ERPNet.Infrastructure --startup-project ERPNet.Api } else { Write-Host 'Cancelado.' }

tasks.label: drop
tasks.command: if ('${input:confirmDrop}' -eq 'Confirmar') { dotnet ef database drop --force --project ERPNet.Infrastructure --startup-project ERPNet.Api } else { Write-Host 'Cancelado.' }

tasks.label: services-up
tasks.command: docker compose up -d; Start-Sleep -Seconds 10; $urls = @('http://localhost:8025', 'http://localhost:9001', 'http://localhost:15672'); foreach ($url in $urls) { Start-Process $url }

tasks.label: clear-minio
tasks.command: $bucket = (Get-Content ERPNet.Api/appsettings.json | ConvertFrom-Json).MinIO.BucketName; Write-Host "Vaciando bucket: $bucket"; docker compose exec minio mc alias set local http://localhost:9000 erpnet 'ERPNet_Dev123!' --api S3v4; docker compose exec minio mc rm --recursive --force --dangerous "local/$bucket"; Write-Host 'Bucket vaciado.'

inputs.description: ¿Aplicar migraciones pendientes a la base de datos?
⚠ ¿BORRAR la base de datos? Esta acción es irreversible.
